name: 2nd World Congress on Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Medicine
content: Join top rehabilitation researchers and clinicians from across the globe at the 2nd World Congress on Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Medicine (PTRM 2021) from December 13-14, 2021 in Dubai, UAE. The theme of this year’s congress is “Excellence in Physical Therapy & Rehab: Transformation for an Impactful and Sustainable Future!” We are offering a unique "hybrid" experience with both in-person and virtual opportunities. We look forward to welcoming you and your complete team in a SAFE, HEALTHY, FRIENDLY, and BEAUTIFUL city DUBAI!
